name: AWS Ground Station Well Architected Lens
description: A custom lens for evaluating AWS Ground Station workloads against Well Architected principles, focusing on satellite communication operations, mission-critical requirements, and space industry best practices.

questions.title: How do you plan and execute satellite contact missions?
questions.description: Effective mission planning ensures optimal use of antenna time, successful data collection, and efficient resource utilization. This includes contact scheduling, conflict resolution, and automated execution procedures.

choices.title: Implement automated contact scheduling with conflict resolution

helpfulResource.displayText: AWS Ground Station provides APIs for automated scheduling and conflict management. Implement automated systems to optimize antenna utilization and minimize scheduling conflicts.

improvementPlan.displayText: Develop automated scheduling systems using AWS Ground Station APIs, implement conflict resolution algorithms, and create dashboards for mission planning visibility.

choices.title: Use manual scheduling processes with documented procedures

helpfulResource.displayText: While manual scheduling provides control, it can lead to inefficiencies and human errors. Consider implementing semi-automated processes to improve reliability.

improvementPlan.displayText: Document current manual processes, identify automation opportunities, and gradually implement automated scheduling tools to reduce human error and improve efficiency.

choices.title: Implement comprehensive monitoring and alerting for satellite passes

helpfulResource.displayText: Real-time monitoring of satellite contacts is crucial for mission success. Use CloudWatch and custom metrics to track contact performance and alert on issues.

improvementPlan.displayText: Set up CloudWatch dashboards, configure alerts for contact failures, implement real-time monitoring of signal quality and data reception rates.

questions.title: How do you process and distribute satellite data efficiently?
questions.description: Efficient data processing ensures timely delivery of satellite data to end users and downstream systems. This includes real-time processing, batch processing, and data distribution mechanisms.

helpfulResource.displayText: Use AWS services like Kinesis Data Streams, Lambda, and Step Functions to create real-time processing pipelines for time-sensitive satellite data.

improvementPlan.displayText: Design and implement real-time processing pipelines using AWS streaming services, optimize for low latency, and implement error handling and retry mechanisms.

choices.title: Use batch processing for non-time-sensitive data

helpfulResource.displayText: AWS Batch and Step Functions can efficiently process large volumes of satellite data in batch mode, optimizing costs for non-urgent processing requirements.

improvementPlan.displayText: Implement batch processing workflows using AWS Batch, optimize job scheduling and resource allocation, and implement data quality checks.

choices.title: Implement automated data distribution to downstream systems

helpfulResource.displayText: Use Amazon SNS, SQS, and EventBridge to create event-driven data distribution systems that automatically deliver processed data to consumers.

improvementPlan.displayText: Design event-driven architectures for data distribution, implement message queuing for reliability, and create APIs for data access.

questions.title: How do you protect satellite data in transit and at rest?
questions.description: Satellite data often contains sensitive information requiring protection against unauthorized access. This includes encryption, access controls, and compliance with regulations like ITAR and EAR.

choices.title: Implement encryption for data in transit and at rest

helpfulResource.displayText: Use AWS KMS for key management, enable encryption for S3 buckets, and ensure all data transfers use TLS encryption. Consider customer-managed keys for sensitive data.

improvementPlan.displayText: Implement comprehensive encryption strategy using AWS KMS, enable S3 bucket encryption, configure TLS for all data transfers, and establish key rotation policies.

choices.title: Implement fine-grained access controls and authentication

helpfulResource.displayText: Use AWS IAM with least privilege principles, implement multi-factor authentication, and consider AWS SSO for centralized access management.

improvementPlan.displayText: Review and implement least privilege IAM policies, enable MFA for all users, implement role-based access controls, and regularly audit permissions.

choices.title: Implement controls for regulatory compliance (ITAR, EAR, etc.)

helpfulResource.displayText: Ensure compliance with export control regulations by implementing appropriate data classification, access controls, and audit logging.

improvementPlan.displayText: Implement data classification schemes, establish compliance monitoring, create audit trails, and ensure geographic data residency requirements are met.

questions.title: How do you ensure high availability for mission-critical satellite operations?
questions.description: Satellite contacts have narrow time windows and cannot be repeated easily. High availability is crucial to ensure successful data collection during these limited opportunities.

choices.title: Deploy across multiple AWS regions with Ground Station antennas

helpfulResource.displayText: Use multiple AWS regions with Ground Station capabilities to provide redundancy and increase contact opportunities for satellites.

improvementPlan.displayText: Identify optimal regions for satellite coverage, implement multi-region deployments, and create automated failover mechanisms between regions.

helpfulResource.displayText: Create redundant processing pipelines to ensure data can be processed even if primary systems fail during critical satellite passes.

improvementPlan.displayText: Design redundant processing architectures, implement automatic failover mechanisms, and test disaster recovery procedures regularly.

choices.title: Implement comprehensive backup and recovery procedures

helpfulResource.displayText: Use AWS Backup and implement point-in-time recovery for critical data and configurations to minimize data loss and recovery time.

improvementPlan.displayText: Implement automated backup strategies, define RTO/RPO requirements, test recovery procedures, and document disaster recovery plans.

questions.title: How do you optimize data processing performance for satellite workloads?
questions.description: Satellite data processing often involves large datasets with varying processing requirements. Optimizing performance ensures timely data delivery and efficient resource utilization.

choices.title: Implement parallel processing for large datasets

helpfulResource.displayText: Use AWS services like EMR, Batch, and Lambda to implement parallel processing of satellite data, reducing processing time and improving throughput.

improvementPlan.displayText: Design parallel processing architectures, implement data partitioning strategies, optimize resource allocation, and monitor processing performance.

helpfulResource.displayText: Use AWS Auto Scaling to automatically adjust compute resources based on workload demands, optimizing both performance and costs.

improvementPlan.displayText: Configure auto-scaling policies, implement predictive scaling for known satellite pass schedules, and optimize scaling metrics and thresholds.

choices.title: Optimize storage performance for satellite data access patterns

helpfulResource.displayText: Use appropriate S3 storage classes and implement intelligent tiering to optimize storage performance and costs based on data access patterns.

improvementPlan.displayText: Analyze data access patterns, implement S3 Intelligent Tiering, optimize data organization and partitioning, and use appropriate storage classes.

questions.title: How do you optimize antenna usage and associated costs?
questions.description: Ground Station antenna time is a significant cost component. Optimizing antenna usage through efficient scheduling, contact duration optimization, and resource planning can significantly reduce costs.

choices.title: Optimize contact duration and scheduling efficiency

helpfulResource.displayText: Analyze satellite pass predictions and optimize contact scheduling to minimize antenna time while maximizing data collection efficiency.

improvementPlan.displayText: Implement contact duration optimization algorithms, analyze historical data to improve scheduling efficiency, and automate contact parameter tuning.

choices.title: Use reserved capacity for predictable workloads

helpfulResource.displayText: For predictable satellite contact patterns, consider reserved capacity options to reduce costs compared to on-demand pricing.

improvementPlan.displayText: Analyze usage patterns to identify opportunities for reserved capacity, implement capacity planning processes, and optimize reserved vs. on-demand usage.

choices.title: Implement data lifecycle management to optimize storage costs

helpfulResource.displayText: Use S3 lifecycle policies to automatically transition satellite data to lower-cost storage classes based on access patterns and retention requirements.

improvementPlan.displayText: Analyze data access patterns, implement S3 lifecycle policies, configure intelligent tiering, and optimize data retention policies.
